name: subtitle
desc: Allows you to include a subtitle that will, by default, appear just below a title (if one is included).

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. Requires that background-color be set.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: bold
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not in the subtitle.

attrs.name: border-bottomborderBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom border style. Defaults to black when color is not set properly.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. Requires border width. See also line-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: border-leftborderLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style. Operates like border-bottom.

attrs.name: border-radiusborderRadius
attrs.desc: Sets the object's border radius, for rounded corners. The higher the value, the more rounded the corners appear.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-leftborderRadiusBottomLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-left border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-rightborderRadiusBottomRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-right border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-leftborderRadiusTopLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-left border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-rightborderRadiusTopRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-right border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-rightborderRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right border style. Operates like border-bottom.

attrs.name: border-topborderTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top border style. Operates like border-bottom.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes. If no border-color is set, will display in black.

attrs.name: callout
attrs.desc: Sets whether or not the object will have a callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-extensioncalloutExtension
attrs.desc: Sets the length for extension line off the tip of the callout arrow. Requires border-width.

attrs.name: callout-heightcalloutHeight
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-hookcalloutHook
attrs.desc: Sets a location for the point of the tip of the callout arrow. Uses XY coordinates.

attrs.name: callout-offsetcalloutOffset
attrs.desc: Sets the offset for the origin of the callout arrow. Uses positive or negative values to move the arrow right/left/up/down.

attrs.name: callout-positioncalloutPosition
attrs.desc: Sets which edge will be the location for the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-widthcalloutWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: color
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the text in the subtitle. Similar with font-color.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the fill type.

attrs.name: font-anglefontAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the subtitle text. Similar with angle.

attrs.name: font-colorfontColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the subtitle text. Similar with color.

attrs.name: font-familyfontFamily
attrs.desc: Sets the font family of the subtitle text.

attrs.name: font-sizefontSize
attrs.desc: Sets the font size of the subtitle text.

attrs.name: font-stylefontStyle
attrs.desc: Sets the font style of the subtitle text. Similar with italic.

attrs.name: font-weightfontWeight
attrs.desc: Sets the font weight of the subtitle text. Similar with bold.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors. To be used with gradient-stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets the gradient stops for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors. To be used with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the object's height.

attrs.name: italic
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text of the subtitle is displayed with italic characters or not. Similar with font-weight.

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the item id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: map
attrs.desc: Sets the map id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: margin
attrs.desc: Sets the object's margin/s by positioning it within the specified area.

attrs.name: margin-bottommarginBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom margin.

attrs.name: margin-leftmarginLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left margin.

attrs.name: margin-rightmarginRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left margin.

attrs.name: margin-topmarginTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's margin from the top of the chart.

attrs.name: max-charsmaxChars
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum number of characters displayed in the text label of the subtitle. If value is smaller than the length of the text, the original text will be trimmed and '...' will be appended at the end.

attrs.name: max-widthmaxWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum width of the text box. If text is longer than the max-width value, it will overlap the box or will wrap if wrap-text is set to true.

attrs.name: offset-xoffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: offset-yoffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: padding
attrs.desc: Sets the object's padding around the text of the subtitle.

attrs.name: padding-bottompaddingBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom padding around the text of the subtitle.

attrs.name: padding-leftpaddingLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left padding around the text of the subtitle.

attrs.name: padding-rightpaddingRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right padding around the text of the subtitle.

attrs.name: padding-toppaddingTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top padding around the text of the subtitle.

attrs.name: position
attrs.desc: Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

attrs.name: rtl (right-to-left)
attrs.desc: Renders text right-to-left. Default value is false.

attrs.name: shadow
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object's shadow is visible or not.  Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-alphashadowAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: shadow-angleshadowAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the shadow underneath the object.

attrs.name: shadow-blurshadowBlur
attrs.desc: Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-colorshadowColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

attrs.name: shadow-distanceshadowDistance
attrs.desc: Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Sets the text content of the object of the subtitle. Defaults to gray when font-color is not set.

attrs.name: text-aligntextAlign
attrs.desc: Sets the text's horizontal alignment relative to the box of the subtitle.

attrs.name: text-alphatextAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the subtitle text.

attrs.name: text-decorationtextDecoration
attrs.desc: Sets the text decoration for the subtitle text. Similar with underline.

attrs.name: underline
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text of the subtitle is displayed with underlined characters or not.

attrs.name: vertical-alignverticalAlign
attrs.desc: Sets the text's vertical alignment relative to the subtitle object's box .

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Sets the visibility of the object.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the object's width. May truncate text.

attrs.name: wrap-textwrapText
attrs.desc: Forces wrapping of the text inside a confined box width. Requires a setting for width. Without text wrap, text will be truncated.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.

attrs.name: z-indexzIndex
attrs.desc: Sets the z position of the object. Objects with higher z indexes will appear "above" those with lower z index values.
